Class PassphraseAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • i5.las2peer.security.Agent

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XmlAble, MessageReceiver, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MonitoringAgent, ServiceAgent, UserAgent

    public abstract class PassphraseAgent
extends Agent
    Base class for pass phrase protected agents.
